reviews.text: Don't go in your car to the station or you may fall foul of the bus gate trap in Fishergate. It's not properly signed because neither  the council nor the traffic appeal adjudicator know or understand the difference between a BUS GATE ( no other lane for cars ) and a BUS LANE (has a lane for cars running next to it ). They think it's a bus lane, which is what they sign it as, causing thousands of innocent motorists to be unjustly fined. There are absolutely no 'BUS LANE' or 'BUS GATE' markings on the road surface either which is essential for what looks like a pedestrian area.
Needs a lot of money spending on it. The toilets stink to high heaven. Not enough seating, especially if there is delays
Mens toilets disgusting with booths flooded with water and urine. Where are the cleaners. They should be there full time to keep the place clean for human use.

A massive thankyou to the railway staff at Preston but in particular to Jayne Williams, who went above and beyond .  With her help a horrible start to the day turned into a brilliant journey and a great day !! Thanks again Jayne !!!!
Large, plenty of staff and all of the amenities such as a shop and bar.
